page.title: 11Special events in Buckden
page.content: Three of the special events held in the village are a Feast Week,May Feastival and Donkey Derby. { Feast Week,}the first in July, is a week of exciting activities for all the family. The events include super stars and picture competitions as well as a musical evening. { A May Feastival}is celebrated by the infant department of the school. Carrying flowers, the children process onto the field where the eldest girl is crowned May Queen. As well as singing the eldest Children maypole dance . { The Donkey Derby}is organised on The Towers by the scouts. Anyone can sponser a donkey to run in the races and there are several sidestalls to entertain everyone.
